duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and allocate project resources, prepare budgets, monitor progress, and keep stakeholders informed throughout the project lifecycle.
Complete materials take-offs, establish cost estimates, review project proposals, drawings, and plans to determine time frame and funding limitations.
Develop relationships with subcontractors, maintain lists of quality subcontractors, and confer with project staff to outline work plan and assign duties.
Direct and coordinate project personnel activities, prepare schedules, review status reports, and prepare project reports for management and clients.
Provide technical advice, resolve problems, and mentor younger Project Managers while maintaining strong client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Civil Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
